title: Emergency Reaction to Deshaun Watson Ruling
itunes:title: Emergency Reaction to Deshaun Watson Ruling
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal convene quickly to discuss the outcome of Judge Sue L. Robinson’s recommendation that Deshaun Watson be suspended the first 6 games of the 2022 season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
